summary.label:
BOX. To delivery που πάντα κερδίζεις

Γιατί με κάθε παραγγελία, μαζεύεις πόντους για να τους εξαργυρώνεις σε GB & εκπτώσεις σε κάθε πιάτο και σε κάθε μαγαζί, χωρίς περιορισμούς. Βλέπεις… εδώ με κάθε σου κίνηση κερδίζεις στο φαΐ…

Το BOX είναι το μόνο food delivery app που σε επιβραβεύει, κάθε φορά. Με κάθε παραγγελία ή και χρήση του app, συλλέγεις πόντους που μπορείς να εξαργυρώσεις άμεσα σε εκπτώσεις στο φαγητό σου, GB από την COSMOTE ή επιπλέον εκπτώσεις με κωδικούς COSMOTE Deals for You. Σε κάθε πιάτο, σε κάθε μαγαζί, χωρίς περιορισμούς.

Τι άλλο μπορείς να κάνεις στο ΒΟΧ;

- Να απολαμβάνεις αποκλειστικές προσφορές από τα συνεργαζόμενα καταστήματα

- Να προγραμματίσεις την ώρα και την τοποθεσίας παράδοσης κάθε παραγγελίας

- Να επιλέξεις ανέπαφη συναλλαγή- Να αφήσεις online το tip σου στον διανομέα

- Να παραλάβεις ο ίδιος την παραγγελία σου αν το επιθυμείς

- Με κάθε παραγγελία σου μπορείς να προσφέρεις στο «Χαμόγελο του Παιδιού» ένα χρηματικό ποσό, καλύπτοντας έτσι τις βασικές ανάγκες σίτισης στα Κέντρα Στήριξης Παιδιού και Οικογένειας Παιδιών.

Και όλα αυτά μπορείς να τα βρεις σε περισσότερα από 10000 καταστήματα σε 64 πόλεις πανελλαδικά (όπως καταστήματα φαγητού και καφέ, μαναβικής, κρεοπωλεία, ιχθυοπωλεία, delicatessen, κάβες, βιολογικά προϊόντα, ζαχαροπλαστεία) αλλά και στα σούπερ μάρκετ «Μασούτης» και «Κρητικός» με παράδοση ακόμα και αυθημερόν, σε τιμές και προσφορές που ισχύουν και στα φυσικά καταστήματα.

Τι περιμένεις; Εγκατάστησε τώρα το app για να κερδίζεις κάθε φορά.

Wolt makes it incredibly easy to discover and get great food, groceries and anything you might need delivered in your city. Whatever you’re in the mood for, we’ll make sure it gets delivered to you. Just pick a restaurant or shop, choose what you want, swipe to order and let us do the rest!

You’ll be kept in the loop on the status of the delivery in real-time, with a minute-by-minute countdown. If staring at a clock isn’t your thing, don’t worry – we'll also send you notifications so you know when your order is about to arrive.

There is a new way to take the BeanBoozled Challenge. This app lets users play the game (remotely and in person), capture photos, find retailers and order online. 

BeanBoozled is a game of risk with two different challenging ways to play. Are you brave enough? 

The original BeanBoozled:  Ten delicious Jelly Belly jelly bean flavors (like Juicy Pear or Pomegranate) have been paired up with ten lookalikes in weird and wild flavors (like Booger or Old Bandage). Will it be Buttered Popcorn or Rotten Egg? Peach or Barf? There’s only one way to find out! 

The BeanBoozled Fiery Five Challenge asks how hot can you handle? Five progressively hot jelly beans range from smoldering Sriracha to scorching Carolina Reaper. Can you handle the heat?

What is the BeanBoozled App?
• Take the game anywhere! Take turns spinning the BeanBoozled wheel in the app to see what flavor you’ll have to try next.
• The app comes with a video sharing function so you can challenge your friends – wherever they are – in real time. You don’t need to physically be together to play BeanBoozled! Just use the built-in “Challenge A Friend” feature to play with your friend remotely. The app will send an invitation to your friend to play, and once they accept, you’re sharing the same spinner and playing the game together.
• Take photos while you play in the “Challenge A Friend” mode, or 6-second GIFs of the crazy faces your friends make. Add photo frames and share them to your social media channels.
• When you run out of a flavor, simply tell the app and the spinner will continue play without landing on what you’re missing.
• Need more BeanBoozled jelly beans? Search for a store near you with our built-in Store Locator, or use the option to buy online.
• Not sure what the jelly bean flavors are? Consult the handy flavor menu in the app for a helpful guide.

A Few Tips…
• DO have a trash can handy at all times. Trust us – you’ll need it.
• If you're playing BeanBoozled Fiery Five, have some milk, ice cream, rice or honey handy to extinguish the burn.
• DO NOT let wimps or crybabies play this game. (OK- maybe let them play after all. It can be fun to watch!)
• DO Make up your own rules. This is BeanBoozled where anything goes! Your imagination is your only limit.

Playing with your food has never been this much fun!

Ο γαστρονόμος είναι η ηλεκτρονική έκδοση του περιοδικού γαστρονόμος της Καθημερινής, με καινούργια, πρωτότυπη ύλη και συνταγές. Κάθε μέρα, 24 ώρες.

Η θεματολογία περιλαμβάνει τα εξής:
Συνταγές: Νόστιμες και πρωτότυπες συνταγές για κάθε περίσταση από τους σεφ του περιοδικού, με δυνατότητα εύρεσης ανά βασικό υλικό (π.χ. κοτόπουλο, κρέας, ψάρι κ.λπ.) ή είδος πιάτου (γεύμα, σαλάτα, σούπα κ.λπ.).
- Εστιατόρια: Ενας χρήσιμος οδηγός με τα καλύτερα εστιατόρια, ταβέρνες, μεζεδοπωλεία και ουζερί της Αθήνας αλλά και της υπόλοιπης Ελλάδας. Οι συντάκτες του γαστρονόμου επισκέπτονται ανωνύμως γνωστά και άγνωστα στέκια για φαγητό και καταγράφουν ό,τι δοκίμασαν και τους κέντρισε το ενδιαφέρον. Στη στήλη αυτή -θα τη βρείτε αποκλειστικά στον ηλεκτρονικό γαστρονόμο- αναφέρεται για κάθε μαγαζί η θέση, η ατμόσφαιρα, το φαγητό, η κάβα, ο λογαριασμός αλλά και επιπλέον πληροφορίες προκειμένου να έχετε μια πλήρη εικόνα πριν την επίσκεψή σας. 
- Επιλογές: Τυριά, αλλαντικά, ιδιαίτερα προϊόντα, μαγειρικά γκάτζετ και χρήσιμα σκεύη που «ξετρυπώνει» η συντακτική ομάδα, καθώς επίσης και νέα που αφορούν εστιατόρια.
- Ειδήσεις: Ειδήσεις από το χώρο της γαστρονομίας και της διατροφής από την Ελλάδα και όλο τον κόσμο.
- Καφέ/Μπαρ: Πού μας αρέσει να πίνουμε καφέ; Ποιο είναι το γλυκό-ατού του κάθε μαγαζιού; Ακόμη, κοκτέιλ και wine bar που αξίζουν την προσοχή μας.
- Βίντεο: Μαθήματα μαγειρικής και βιντεοσυνταγές από τους σεφ του γαστρονόμου.
- Συμβουλές: Μυστικά, τεχνικές και άλλα χρήσιμα και πρακτικά μαγειρικά κόλπα.
- Μαγαζιά: Παντοπωλεία, ντελικατέσεν, μπαχαράδικα, ιχθυοπωλεία, κρεοπωλεία, τεϊοπωλεία, ξηροκαρπάδικα, αρτοποιεία και όχι μόνο. Ένας οδηγός με τις καλύτερες διευθύνσεις για να προμηθευτούμε τα απαραίτητα για το καθημερινό μας τραπέζι. 
- Παραγωγοί: Άξιοι παραγωγοί ελαιολάδου, τυροκομικών, φρούτων και λαχανικών, κρεάτων και αλλαντικών, ζυμαρικών κ.ά. που αξίζουν την προσοχή μας.
- Γαστρολογίες: Άρθρα γνώμης και ενδιαφέρουσες ιστορίες γαστρονομικού περιεχομένου. 
- Βραβεία: Από το 2008 ο Γαστρονόμος βραβεύει ανθρώπους που παράγουν, μεταποιούν και διακινούν, με αγάπη και γνώσεις, επώνυμα, ποιοτικά προϊόντα. Μάθετε τις ιστορίες τους.


Gastronomos is the real time, online edition of Kathimerini's Gastronomos magazine, enriched with its own original material and recipes.

It includes:
- Recipes: Delicious and original recipes for every occasion, thought up and executed by the magazine's chefs. The recipes can be searched either by their basic ingredients (i.e. chicken, meat, fish, etc.) or by the broader category to which they belong (meal, salad, soup, etc.).
- Restaurants: A useful guide of Athens' best restaurants, bistrots, taverns, etc. The magazine's editors visit -incognito- the city's hangouts (famous and unknown) and write down everything they find intriguing. This column can be found exclusively in the online version of gastronomos.
- Editors' choices: Cheeses, cold cuts, special and original products, useful kitchen gadgets andutensils, as well as restaurant news from the editorial team.
- News: Global and local news concerning food and diet issues.
- Cafés/Bars: Where do we like to drink our coffee? Which is each store's signature dessert? Also, which cocktail or wine bars deserve our attention?
- Videos: Audiovisual cooking lessons, tips and recipes from the chefs of gastronomos.
- Tips: Useful and practical secrets and techniques.
- Shops: We search around town and all over Greece in order to find the best groceries, delis, fishstores, bakeries and butcher shops. Also, we look for the best shops to buy good quality spices, tea, nuts, kitchen equipment and more.
- Producers: Olive oil, cheese, fruit, vegetable, meat and all kinds of producers that are recognised for their work and products.
- Opinions: Personal articles and stories on gastronomy.
- Awards: Since 2008 Gastronomos has been honoring producers, manufacturers and traders of high quality products that demonstrate a remarkable love and a special know-how for what they do.

Waar een klein wagentje groot in kan zijn…

Wist je dat Picnic de snelst groeiende online supermarkt van Nederland is? Geen zorgen als we nog niet bij jou kunnen bezorgen, want we breiden snel uit. Schrijf je in en we houden je op de hoogte!

GialloZafferano, il primo sito italiano di cucina, con oltre 5000 ricette, videoricette e audioricette dal successo garantito.

Ogni giorno la redazione di GialloZafferano seleziona e organizza le migliori ricette per aiutarti a scoprire, in qualsiasi momento della giornata, nuove idee per i tuoi pranzi e le tue cene. In più puoi scegliere di ricevere, con una notifica push, la migliore ricetta del giorno.

GialloZafferano è inoltre attento al tuo benessere e ti offre tante informazioni nutrizionali complete e la possibilità, grazie al nuovo motore di ricerca, di filtrare le ricette anche in base e preferenze e intolleranze. Con questa nuova versione potrai cercare comodamente ricette senza glutine, senza lattosio o a basso nichel e ricevere tante idee per piatti sani e leggeri.

Cerca o sfoglia tutte le nostre ricette, ordinate per portata e per categoria. Tante informazioni utili dalla difficoltà di realizzazione, ai tempi di preparazione e cottura e il numero di portate.

La nuova versione dell’app comprende tante novità che ti permettono di cercare nuove ricette, averle sempre disponibili e contribuire alla community con la tua versione della ricetta:

> Ricettari: Se ti piace una ricetta, mettigli un 'cuore' e crea i tuoi ricettari; Il pranzo della domenica, una cena con gli amici, il menu dedicato a un’occasione speciale.. Sei tu che scegli il nome dei tuoi ricettari e quali ricette lo compongono.

> Lista della Spesa: Segna gli ingredienti che ti servono per le tue ricette preferite e porta l’app di GialloZafferano a fare la spesa con te; ti ricorda cosa devi comprare e a che ricetta servono. Ti serve un aiuto? puoi condividere la lista della spesa come e con chi vuoi.

> Commenta le ricette: racconta il piatto che hai cucinato e se vuoi aggiungi una foto per condividere o contribuire con i tuoi feedback alla Community di GialloZafferano.

>Valori nutrizionali e ricette per il benessere: per mangiare sano e conoscere meglio ciò che cucini, anche sotto il profilo dei valori nutrizionali.

>Podcast e audioricette: prepara le ricette più famose con la nuova modalità “podcast interattivo”. Potrai cucinare a mani libere ascoltando le indicazioni di GialloZafferano passo dopo passo.

E se hai bisogno di sostituire un ingrediente, cambiare le dosi o vuoi provare una cottura alternativa, chiedi al team di GialloZafferano, ti risponderà in tempi brevissimi.

Giallo Zafferano sempre con Te: grazie alla nuova registrazione, all’utilizzo del tuo profilo Facebook o al tuo account Apple ID, tutti i servizi di GialloZafferano possono essere utilizzati a tua scelta sull’app o sul sito. Ovunque troverai i tuoi ricettari, la tua lista della spesa o i tuoi commenti alle ricette.

summary.label:
The Anova Precision® Oven is the first combi oven with pro-level features designed specifically for the home cook. Paired with the Anova Oven app, you’ll enjoy a fully connected cooking experience and the most advanced features of the Oven.

Break out of your everyday cooking routine with inspiration from the step-by-step recipes developed specifically for the Anova Precision Oven. With the connected app, you can start cooking with a single button press and the Wi-Fi enabled Oven will preheat to your recipe’s recommended settings. As your food cooks, you’ll be able to keep an eye on your timers and food probe readings remotely, and notifications will alert you when it’s time for the next hands-on step. 

If you want to cook freestyle, you can create your own multi-stage cooking programs in the app. Define the oven settings for each stage of cooking and the transitions between stages to build stress-free, no-compromise recipes for all of your favorite foods. Your cook history is stored automatically so you can replay your past cooks, or share your recipes with the community.  

Features:
- Explore our library of recipes created specifically for the Anova Precision Oven. These recipes span meals, cuisine types, and cooking techniques to educate and inspire you to create your own new dishes.
- Learn step-by step techniques by following along with clear photos and easy-to-read instructions from top recipe creators. 
- Start cooking any recipe with a single tap. The cook settings are sent to your oven directly.
- Monitor your cook by watching real time temperature and timer readings. View the oven’s temperature and steam settings, and even monitor the core temperature of your food when using the included food probe. 
- Go freestyle with manual cooking. You can start cooking from the app, or from the oven itself, without relying on specific recipes. 
- Make adjustments on the fly. If dinner is ready but you’re not, add a holding stage to your cook so your food remains at its best. 
- Create multi-stage recipes. Most foods have more that one cooking goal, like achieving juicy meat and crispy skin. Separate your cooking into multiple oven stages to optimize for each goal, like the pros do. With full control over oven functions and the ability to transition automatically based on timer or probe targets, true multi-stage, combi cooking is finally available for home cooks. 
- View your cook history. It’s like having a DVR for your Oven — recipes and manual cooking sessions are automatically saved to your history, making it easy to revisit your favorites.
